body: Markdown is a lightweight markup language for creating formatted text.
It uses simple syntax to format text, create lists, insert links, and more.
See the official Markdown guide for more details: https://www.markdownguide.org/
Markdown Info.description: Provides general information about Markdown syntax.

Markdown Comment (HTML).description: Creates an HTML comment within Markdown.

Markdown Multi-Line Comment (HTML).description: Creates a multi-line HTML comment within Markdown.

Markdown Unordered List.description: Creates an unordered list item in Markdown.

Markdown Ordered List.description: Creates an ordered list item in Markdown.

Markdown Code Block.description: Creates a code block in Markdown.
